refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The static method creates an XMLType instance from the src XML entity. If the parameter src is not an XML entity then it is converted to it via an internal call of xtree_doc() or xml_tree_doc(). A schema may be associated with an XML entity by passing its URI as schema_uri; this schema can be used later to validate the structure of the document.

refsect2.title: src
refsect2.para: An XML entity or a value that can be converted to an XML entity.

refsect2.title: schema_uri
refsect2.para: A URI of the schema of the document. The default is NULL to make result non-schema based.

refsect2.title: validated
refsect2.para: An integer flag that indicates if the document is already validated against the schema of the document (this is to avoid redundant validations). The default is 0.

refsect2.title: wellformed
refsect2.para: This parameter is unused and is listed solely for compatibility.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The method returns a new instance of XMLType.

example.title: Creating instances of XMLType
example.para: The procedure creates two instances (a schema-based and a non schema-based) and demonstrates that these instances are filled with proper data.
